Starbucks is releasing a "fang-tastic" frap suited for a drowsy Dracula. 
The Frappula Frappuccino is this year's festive Halloween drink. Last year Starbucks released the Franken Frapuccino made with green tea. 
Per the chain's release , the drink is "made with white chocolate sauce, milk and ice blended together then layered between mocha sauce and a dollop of whipped cream. A drizzle of raspberry syrup oozes from the rim, which is finished with whipped cream on top." 
The Frappula Frappuccino will be released in the U.S. and Canada between Oct. 28 through Oct. 31. Europe and Latin America will receieve the vampire-themed drink from Oct. 30 through Nov. 2.
